GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
bpf: fix potential 32-bit overflow when accessing ARRAY map element

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 3c7256b880b3a5aa1895fd169a34aa4224a11862, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit c85d69135a9175c50a823d04d62d932312d037b3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: bpf: fix potential 32-bit overflow when accessing ARRAY map element
